items.headline: Stock futures slump as U.S.-Europe trade tensions ramp up over Trump’s Greenland demands
items.summary_en: Wall Street braced for losses when regular trading resumes Tuesday, as U.S. stock futures fell over the holiday weekend following President Donald Trump’s latest tariff threats against Europe.
items.next_en: Next: watch scheduled data (CPI/Jobs/Fed) or company guidance.

items.headline: My sister is buying our parents’ $3 million house, but wants to deduct $100K for renovations. Who’s right?
items.summary_en: “If she didn’t want the home, it would have been sold at fair market value.”

items.headline: Jerome Powell will attend Supreme Court hearing on Lisa Cook’s firing
items.summary_en: Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell, who has been a target of the Trump administration, is showing a sign of unity with another central-bank member.

items.headline: ‘I still have a mortgage’: I’m no longer confident that my costs will actually fall in retirement. What can I do?
items.summary_en: “I think my withdrawals from my 401(k) and IRA may need to be larger than my current take-home pay.”

items.headline: I started working as a dishwasher at age 13. Social Security refuses to acknowledge this. Am I being cheated?
items.summary_en: “I am 69, and started collecting Social Security when I was 66½.”

items.headline: Trump’s latest E.U. tariff threats may spur more investors away from the ‘buy America’ trade, analysts say
items.summary_en: Some are watching for a “weaponization of capital,” and moves into some Europe stocks — and away from the dollar — amid fresh U.S. tariffs threats against Europe.

items.headline: ‘I have an economics degree from a fantastic university’: I’m 71 with $3 million and earn $250K. Is it time to retire?
items.summary_en: “I have a home worth $1.2 million and owe $300,000 at 3% interest.”

items.headline: I manage an $80K trust for a 15-year-old. How do I do deal with interfering relatives?
items.summary_en: “I don’t want to step on any toes.”

items.headline: My mom, 90, has dementia. My brother wants her to buy a $500K property near his house. Does that make any sense?
items.summary_en: “I can’t, for the life of me, see how this makes sense on any level — personal or financial.”
